root: ^"Look at them," Meyir said, pointing at the camp down in the valley. "Traitors of our cause."

^"I am nothing like them," she responded, pulling on the reins to turn Zhan around to face me.
^"Yet. Continue like this and you'll drown in hatred."
^"The Winged Jevvars are like you and me. It's Khan Lengu who's poisoned their hearts."
^"Yet," I responded. "Continue like this and you'll drown in hatred."
